effect.accacophony.fear.description: makes mobs run away from anything that currently has it.
enchantment.accacophony.ricochet.desc: beam bounces off of surfaces and mobs, often bouncing off of several mobs
enchantment.accacophony.pulse.desc: for the same ammo cost, the beam fires in pulses of three
enchantment.accacophony.overcharge.desc: use all of the energy to shoot one massive beam that deals incredible damage
enchantment.accacophony.orbiting.desc: Instead of throwing the shackle, it will orbit the player, stunning anything it hits, and flying around the player for 15 seconds
enchantment.accacophony.voltage.desc: The flying shackle will now streak lightning
enchantment.accacophony.impact.desc: (incompatible with Orbiting) the shackle explodes and creates a stunning AoE attack (shackle drops on ground)
advancements.accacophony.rayblade.title: Rip and Tear
advancements.accacophony.rayblade_challe: Kill every Forlorn and Nether mob using a Rayblade
advancements.accacophony.arrow_of_fear.t: The only thing they fear is you
advancements.accacophony.arrow_of_fear.d: Use an arrow of fear on any mob
advancements.accacophony.gloomoth_eggs.d: Eat Gloomoth eggs, the unborn children of small defenseless moths-- You monster!
advancements.accacophony.neodymium_shack: Hit any mob from 100 blocks away with a Neodymium Shackle
advancements.accacophony.railgun.title: I call it...THE THUNDERGUN!
advancements.accacophony.railgun_challen: Use a Magnetic Railgun to fling a nuclear bomb, causing it to detonate immediately.
